results.definition: an ancient Hebrew liquid measure equal to about 10 gallons
a soaking and washing in a bathtub
examples: he has a good bath every morning

results.definition: a town in southwestern England on the River Avon; famous for its hot springs and Roman remains
a vessel containing liquid in which something is immersed (as to process it or to maintain it at a constant temperature or to lubricate it)
examples: she soaked the etching in an acid bath
